name: Zeus
description: King of the gods, ruler of Mount Olympus, and god of the sky, weather, thunder, lightning, law, order, and justice.

name: Hera
description: Queen of the gods and the goddess of marriage, women, childbirth, and family.

name: Poseidon
description: God of the sea, earthquakes, storms, and horses.

name: Demeter
description: Goddess of the harvest, agriculture, fertility, and sacred law.

name: Athena
description: Goddess of wisdom, courage, inspiration, civilization, law and justice, strategic warfare, mathematics, strength, strategy, the arts, crafts, and skill.

name: Apollo
description: God of the sun, light, healing, plague, prophecy, poetry, music, and the arts.

name: Artemis
description: Goddess of the hunt, wilderness, moon, and archery.

name: Ares
description: God of war, bloodshed, and violence.

name: Aphrodite
description: Goddess of love, beauty, desire, and fertility.

name: Hephaestus
description: God of fire, metalworking, stone masonry, forges, and the art of sculpture.

name: Hermes
description: God of trade, thieves, travelers, sports, athletes, and border crossings, guide to the Underworld.

name: Hestia
description: Goddess of the hearth, home, and domesticity.

name: Hades
description: God of the underworld and the dead.

name: Persephone
description: Goddess of the underworld, springtime, flowers, and vegetation.

name: Dionysus
description: God of wine, grape harvest, winemaking, fertility, ritual madness, religious ecstasy, and theatre.

name: Eros
description: God of love, attraction, and desire.

name: Nike
description: Goddess of victory.

name: Hypnos
description: God of sleep.

name: Nemesis
description: Goddess of retribution and vengeance.

name: Iris
description: Goddess of the rainbow and messenger of the gods.

name: Tyche
description: Goddess of fortune and prosperity.

name: Eris
description: Goddess of strife and discord.

name: Helios
description: God of the sun.

name: Selene
description: Goddess of the moon.

name: Pan
description: God of the wild, shepherds, flocks, nature, and rustic music.

name: Morpheus
description: God of dreams.

name: Thanatos
description: God of death.

name: Hecate
description: Goddess of magic, witchcraft, the night, moon, ghosts, and necromancy.

name: Gaia
description: Primordial goddess of the Earth.

name: Uranus
description: Primordial god of the sky.

name: Cronus
description: Leader of the first generation of Titans and father of Zeus.

name: Rhea
description: Titaness and mother of Zeus.

name: Prometheus
description: Titan god of forethought and crafty counsel, who gave fire to humanity.

name: Atlas
description: Titan condemned to hold up the sky for eternity.

name: Selene
description: Goddess of the moon.

name: Eos
description: Goddess of the dawn.

name: Nyx
description: Primordial goddess of the night.

name: Erebus
description: Primordial god of darkness.

name: Hemera
description: Primordial goddess of the day.

name: Aether
description: Primordial god of the upper air.

name: Ananke
description: Primordial goddess of inevitability, compulsion, and necessity.

name: Eros
description: Primordial god of procreation.

name: Chaos
description: Primordial void and personification of the lower atmosphere.

name: Tartarus
description: Primordial god of the abyss.

name: Pontus
description: Primordial god of the sea.

name: Eurus
description: God of the east wind.

name: Boreas
description: God of the north wind.

name: Notus
description: God of the south wind.

name: Zephyrus
description: God of the west wind.

name: Phobos
description: God of fear.

name: Deimos
description: God of terror.

name: Harmonia
description: Goddess of harmony and concord.

name: Hebe
description: Goddess of youth.

name: Metis
description: Titaness of wisdom and good counsel.

name: Themis
description: Titaness of divine law and order.

name: Mnemosyne
description: Titaness of memory and mother of the Muses.

name: Oceanus
description: Titan god of the ocean.

name: Tethys
description: Titaness of the sources of fresh water.

name: Hyperion
description: Titan god of heavenly light.

name: Iapetus
description: Titan god of mortality.

name: Coeus
description: Titan god of intellect.

name: Crius
description: Titan god of constellations.

name: Phoebe
description: Titaness of the prophetic mind.

name: Rhea
description: Titaness and mother of the Olympian gods.

name: Theia
description: Titaness of sight and the shining light of the clear blue sky.

name: Leto
description: Titaness of motherhood and mother of Apollo and Artemis.

name: Astraeus
description: Titan god of the dusk and stars.

name: Pallas
description: Titan god of warcraft.

name: Styx
description: Goddess of the river Styx and oaths.

name: Eos
description: Goddess of the dawn.

name: Selene
description: Goddess of the moon.

name: Helios
description: God of the sun.

name: Asteria
description: Titaness of nocturnal oracles and falling stars.

name: Perses
description: Titan god of destruction.

name: Eurybia
description: Goddess of the mastery of the seas.

name: Clymene
description: Titaness of renown, fame, and infamy.

name: Dione
description: Titaness of the oracle of Dodona.

name: Epimetheus
description: Titan god of afterthought and excuses.

name: Menoetius
description: Titan god of violent anger and rash action.

name: Prometheus
description: Titan god of forethought and crafty counsel.

name: Aegaeon
description: God of violent sea storms.

name: Ceto
description: Goddess of the dangers of the ocean and sea monsters.

name: Phorcys
description: God of the hidden dangers of the deep.

name: Echidna
description: Mother of monsters.

name: Cerberus
description: Three-headed dog guarding the entrance to the underworld.

name: Charybdis
description: Sea monster creating whirlpools.

name: Scylla
description: Sea monster with multiple heads.

name: Chimera
description: Fire-breathing monster with a lion's head, goat's body, and serpent's tail.

name: Hydra
description: Multi-headed serpent.

name: Sphinx
description: Creature with a lion's body and a human head.

name: Minotaur
description: Creature with the body of a man and the head of a bull.

name: Medusa
description: Gorgon with snakes for hair.

name: Pegasus
description: Winged horse.

name: Cyclops
description: One-eyed giant.

name: Gorgons
description: Monstrous women with snakes for hair.

name: Sirens
description: Creatures whose songs lure sailors to their deaths.

name: Harpies
description: Winged spirits of sudden, sharp gusts of wind.

name: Satyrs
description: Half-man, half-goat creatures.

name: Nymphs
description: Minor nature goddesses.

name: Furies
description: Deities of vengeance.

name: Griffin
description: Creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle.

name: Phoenix
description: Immortal bird that regenerates from its ashes.

name: Nemean Lion
description: Invulnerable lion defeated by Heracles.
